name: rx-to-async-iterator
description: Convert RxJS Observable streams to async iterators

scripts.test: jshint `npm run -s files` && lintspaces -i js-comments -e .editorconfig `npm run -s files` && mocha
scripts.test-travis: jshint `npm run -s files` && lintspaces -i js-comments -e .editorconfig `npm run -s files` && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec ./test/*

author: tangledfruit
